_StartupPage.Subtitle2: Seems like it's your first time to use this launcher.
_StartupPage.Subtitle3: Anyway, thank you for trying out this project and to set everything up, please choose where will you be placing this launcher's data into your computer.
_StartupPage.Subtitle4_3: button below to choose where do you want to place the game on.

_MainPage.RegionChangeConfirm: Game region will be changed. Do you want to continue?
_MainPage.RegionLoadingSubtitleTimeOut: Loading Region {0} has timed-out (> {1} seconds). Retrying...

_MainPage.MetadataUpdateSubtitle: New metadata for the launcher is available! We recommend you to proceed the update in order to ensure that the launcher could communicate with the miHoYo/HoYoverse servers. Click on "Update Metadata" to update.

_SettingsPage.AppLang_ApplyNeedRestart: *You need to restart the app to take effect the language.
_SettingsPage.AppThemes_ApplyNeedRestart: *You need to restart the app to take effect the theme.
_SettingsPage.AppBG_Note: Note: Image must be in .png, .jpg, .tiff or .bmp format and size less than 4096x4096
_SettingsPage.AppThreads_Help1: This thread will handle how many chunks will be split while downloading files. This mechanism behaves the same as what IDM and aria2c do.
_SettingsPage.AppThreads_Help5: This thread will handle the extraction/verification process while installing/repairing the game.
_SettingsPage.AppThreads_Help6: Note: This setting is no longer effective while installing Honkai Impact 3rd.
_SettingsPage.Update_LatestVer: You are using the latest version.
_SettingsPage.Disclaimer1: This app is not affiliated with
_SettingsPage.Disclaimer3: and completely open-sourced. Any contribution is welcomed.

_Misc.UpdateCompleteSubtitle: Your launcher version has been updated to {0}! (Release Channel: {1})
_Misc.FeatureUnavailableTitle: This feature is unavailable at this moment

_Dialogs.DeltaPatchDetectedTitle: Warning: Delta Patch Update is Detected!
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchDetectedSubtitle:
Delta patch will be used to update your game from {0} to {1}.
Remember, you might still need to download some files in-game as usual.

Do you want to continue?
_Dialogs.DeltaPatchPrevFailedSubtitle: The previous Delta Patch was failed/incompleted! Do you want to restore your game to prevent from redownloading?
_Dialogs.GameConversionPrevFailedSubtitle: The previous Game Conversion was failed/incompleted! Do you want to restore your game to prevent from redownloading?
_Dialogs.PreloadVerifiedSubtitle: Your Pre-Download Package is Ready and Verified!
_Dialogs.LocateInstallSubtitle: Before Installing the Game, Do you want to specify the location of the game?
_Dialogs.ChooseAudioLangSubtitle: Before you install the game, you need to choose which audio language you want to use (Default: Japanese):
_Dialogs.AddtDownloadNeededSubtitle:
You have to download atleast {0} of additional/persistent files. Although you can skip and download it in-game instead.
Do you want to continue?
_Dialogs.AddtDownloadCompletedSubtitle:
Additonal/Persistent Download has been completed! You can now enjoy your game.
Happy gaming!
_Dialogs.ExtremeGraphicsSettingsWarnSubtitle:
You are about to set the setting to Very High!
Remember that Very High setting is basically 2x Render Scale with MSAA Enabled and it's VERY UNOPTIMIZED! (unless you have a NASA Super Computer to run it).

Are you sure to use this setting?
_Dialogs.ExistingInstallSubtitle:
Game is already been installed on this location:

{0}

It's recommended to migrate the game to Collapse Launcher.
However, you can still use Official Launcher to start the game.

Do you want to continue?
_Dialogs.ExistingInstallBHI3LTitle: Existing Installation on BetterHI3Launcher is Detected!
_Dialogs.ExistingInstallBHI3LSubtitle:
Game is already been installed on this location:

{0}

It's recommended to migrate the game to Collapse Launcher.
However, you can still use BetterHi3Launcher to start the game.

Do you want to continue?
_Dialogs.ExistingInstallSteamTitle: Existing Installation on Steam is Detected!
_Dialogs.ExistingInstallSteamSubtitle:
Game is already been installed on Steam in this location:

{0}

Do you want to convert this version to Normal Global version?
Note: Once you converted it, you can't log-in with your steam account and only miHoYo/HoYoverse account login method is available.

Do you want to continue?
_Dialogs.SteamConvertNeedMigrateSubtitle:
You need to migrate the game folder to other location since the app doesn't have permission to do write activity.
It's recommended to move the location to CollapseLauncher folder but you can also choose your own location.

Do you want to move it to CollapseLauncher folder?
_Dialogs.SteamConvertIntegrityDoneSubtitle:
Checking Game Data Integrity is done! The conversion process will download at least {0} of file size.
You can continue or cancel it for later.

Do you want to start the conversion process?
_Dialogs.SteamConvertFailedSubtitle:
Sorry but, conversion process is failed! :(
Please try to start-over the conversion process again.
_Dialogs.InstallDataDownloadResumeSubtitle:
You have downloaded {0}/{1} of the game previously.

Do you want to continue?
_Dialogs.InsufficientDiskSubtitle:
You don't have enough free space to install this game on your {2} drive!

Free Space: {0}
Required Space: {1}.

Please make sure you have enough disk space before installing.
_Dialogs.MigrationSubtitle: Before starting this process, Do you want to specify the location of the game?
_Dialogs.NeedInstallMediaPackTitle: Media Feature Pack can't be found!
_Dialogs.NeedInstallMediaPackSubtitle1: WARNING: Starting from v5.8 update, Honkai Impact 3 needs "Media Feature Pack" to be installed on your PC to run. This will fix "Unable to load DLL 'cri_ware_unity'" error in-game.
_Dialogs.NeedInstallMediaPackSubtitle2: You need to restart your PC after you've installed the Media Feature Pack. However, You can ignore this warning but there might be a chance that you will get "Unable to load DLL 'cri_ware_unity'" error while running the game.
_Dialogs.InstallMediaPackCompleteTitle: Media Feature Pack has been installed!
_Dialogs.InstallMediaPackCompleteSubtitle:
Media Feature Pack has been installed on your PC.
Please restart your PC to apply the effect!
_Dialogs.GameConfigBrokenSubtitle1: The Launcher Scope's config is broken and you need to choose your previous game path manually.
_Dialogs.GameConfigBrokenSubtitle2:
Make sure that the location of the game isn't the same as the path of your launcher's config.ini file, which is in this path:

{0}
_Dialogs.GameConfigBrokenSubtitle3: If yes, then move all of your game files to another location. After that, click on "Locate directory" to choose the path.

_InstallMgmt.RepairFilesRequiredSubtitle:
You have at least {0} files ({1} in size) need to be repaired before updating!

Note: This process may takes longer than expected (depends on how fast and stable your connection is). Also, consider to use VPN (free VPN like ProtonVPN is good enough) if you have slow download speed :)

_InstallConvert.PageFooter3: close the launcher while conversion is running
_InstallConvert.SelectDialogSubtitle:
Note: This conversion will break the integration with default launcher if you installed this game by migrating it.

Please choose your source and target game to be converted:
_InstallConvert.SelectDialogSubtitleNotInstalled: Source game isn't Installed! Please choose another game.
_InstallConvert.ConvertSuccessSubtitle: Game Conversion from {0} to {1} has been successfully completed!
_InstallConvert.CookbookDownloadSubtitle: Downloading recipe for conversion from {0} to {1}
_InstallConvert.CancelMsgSubtitle1:
You're about to cancel the conversion process. Any conversion progress will be aborted.

Are you sure?
_InstallConvert.CancelMsgSubtitle2:
You're about to cancel the conversion process but your game has been already converted to {0}. You'll be skipping the "Post-Conversion Integrity Verification" phase.

Are you sure?

_InstallMigrateSteam.Step2Subtitle1: Migration process will be running in 5 seconds. Please accept the UAC prompt to begin the migration process.

Please choose your source and target game to be converted:

_InstallMigrate.Step1Title: Process will start in 5 seconds. Please accept the UAC dialog to start Migration process
